sen.j: 菊池 時隆（きくち ときたか、弘安10年（1287年） - 嘉元2年（1304年））は鎌倉時代末期の武将。
sen.e: Tokitaka KIKUCHI (1287 - 1304) was a busho (Japanese military commander), who lived during the end of Kamakura period.
Tokitaka KIKUCHI (1287 - 1304) was a Japanese military commander who lived toward the end of the Kamakura period.
sen.cmt: 鎌倉時代末期の→who lived toward the end of the Kamakura period武将→a Japanese military commander"who"の前のカンマは特に必要ないので、削除しました。
sen.e: Tokitaka KIKUCHI (1287 - 1304) was a Japanese military commander who lived toward the end of the Kamakura period.
He was a member of the Kikuchi clan.
He was a member of the Kikuchi family.
He was a member of the Kikuchi family.
He was the first son of Takamori KIKUCHI.
He was the first son of Takamori KIKUCHI.
He was the first son of Takamori KIKUCHI.
His childhood name was Jiro
His childhood name was Jiro.
sen.cmt: 文尾にピリオドを付けました。
sen.e: His childhood name was Jiro.

sen.j: 菊池武房から家督を継ぐものの、嘉元2年（1304年）に17歳の若さで病死する。
sen.e: Although he succeeded to the family from Takefusa KIKUCHI, he died young in 1304 at the age of 17.
Although he succeeded to the family headship from Takefusa KIKUCHI, he died of illness in 1304 at an early age of 17.
sen.cmt: 家督→family headship～の若さで病死する→died of illness at an early age of ～（「病」が訳抜けでしたので、補いました。die of illnessに変更したので、「～の若さで」の表記も、用語リストに従い、変更しました。）
sen.e: Although he succeeded to the family headship from Takefusa KIKUCHI, he died of illness in 1304 at an early age of 17.

sen.j: 後継問題のいざこざで、一族の菊地武本と刺し違えて死亡したとの説もある。
sen.e: According to one theory, he died by falling upon each other's swords with Takemoto (武本) KIKUCHI, one of the family member, disputing over the successor issue.
sen.cmt: 菊地武本→Takemoto (武本) KIKUCHIとしました。
sen.e: There is another theory that he died by stabbing each other with Takemoto KIKUCHI, one of the family member, due to dispute over a successor issue.
sen.cmt: 後継問題のいざこざで→due to dispute over a successor issue（理由を示しているので、due toとしました。）菊池武本→Takemoto KIKUCHI（（武本）の表記は、特に必要ないので、削除しました。）
sen.e: There is another theory that he died by stabbing each other with Takemoto KIKUCHI, one of the family member, due to dispute over a successor issue.

sen.j: その後は弟の菊池武時が相継する。
sen.e: After that, his younger brother Taketoki KIKUCHI took over the family reign.
After that, his younger brother, Taketoki KIKUCHI, took over the family headship.
sen.cmt: 弟の菊池武時→his younger brother, Taketoki KIKUCHI,（Taketoki KIKUCHIの前後にカンマを付けました。）相継する→took over the family headship
sen.e: After that, his younger brother, Taketoki KIKUCHI, took over the family headship.
